snippet.title: SNES The Lost Vikings
snippet.description:
Blizzard's excelent platform puzzle game. The Lost Viking takes us on the role of Olaf, Eric and Baleog. Each with their own skills, they must cooperate to escape the space ship on wich they have been abducted. From this simple game concept results on one of the most innovative games ever made. And it still plays as good and fun as ever!

PS: http://gonintendo.com/?p=68690 Nice to see RMC has a great taste for oldies.
